name: Dawn (itch) (The-Last-Samurai)
description:
slaughter hoards of enemies, will you survive until dawn?

-collect orbs to unlock characters and weapons.

-characters have buffs that make each weapon play and feel   different.

I didn't have enough time to finish everything i wanted  to add to this game, so some features like leveling up and selecting upgrades are not finished, this game jam was a lot of fun and a learned a lot, might update this game in the future.

asset pack used for sprites and music : https://pixel-boy.itch.io/ninja-adventure-asset-pack
